scripts.build:angular-example: cd examples/angular/pokemon-catalog && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:react-example: cd examples/react/pokemon-catalog && yarn && npm run build
scripts.build:lit-example: cd examples/lit/pokemon-catalog && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:react-example && npm run build:angular-example && npm run build:lit-example
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:react-example && npm run test:angular-example && npm run test:lit-example
scripts.validate:examples: npm run validate:react-example && npm run validate:angular-example  && npm run validate:lit-example
scripts.e2e:examples: npm run e2e:react-example && npm run e2e:angular-example && npm run e2e:lit-example
scripts.merge-reports:angular: cd examples/angular/pokemon-catalog && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/json/*.json > index.json
scripts.merge-reports:react: cd examples/react/pokemon-catalog && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/json/*.json > index.json
scripts.merge-reports:lit: cd examples/lit/pokemon-catalog && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/json/*.json > index.json
scripts.merge-reports:examples: npm run merge-reports:react && npm run merge-reprots:angular && npm run merge-reports:lit
scripts.copy-build:examples: mkdir -p build && npm run copy-build:react-example && npm run copy-build:angular-example && npm run copy-build:lit-example
scripts.predeploy:examples: npm run predeploy:react-example && npm run predeploy:angular-example && npm run predeploy:lit-example
scripts.predeploy: npm run predeploy:examples && npm run copy-build:examples
